name: Monster Cube 2048
description:
Monster Cube 2048

Feature

  - Challenge Mode

  • Gameplay is like a normal 2048 game but I use a cube instead of a digit.
  • Buy a monster when you have enough scores.
  • Choose your clan and each clan has a different ability & cube style.
  • Trade monsters if you have enough monster pairs.
  • Upgrade the monster to raise percent and it increases your scores each turn.
  • When reaching a certain milestone will give bonus points each turn.
  • There are recipes available for you to observe the progress.
  • There is a book containing all the monsters I designed.

 - Puzzle Mode

  • Stage: 16
  • You need to complete the required cube in the required turn of the stage.
